events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Categorized customer inquiry regarding refund request due to receiving an incorrect product shipment.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request specifically for order #789456.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request due to the wrong item received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order confirmation so I can process the refund quickly?
Here are the photos of the delivered product along with a screenshot of the order confirmation email you requested.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process, and you should see the credited amount within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund initiation. I appreciate your help resolving this issue smoothly.
The refund case has been marked as resolved following confirmation of the refund initiation on our end.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further questions were raised, this case is now officially closed.
